title: BookingBug(now jrni)
description: A remarkable project that motivated me to learn so many technical and soft skills. Our client was from the UK, and the collaboration was very fruitful. They had different development teams there, and we learned and grew together. I had the pleasure of being a team lead for a group of seven developers and one QA from ASSIST. It was a poetic combination, we worked together as a family, and we learned many great things.
I was responsible for guiding and helping my colleagues so that we could achieve together the set objectives. I've learned a lot about patience and the importance of being understanding.
We were responsabile for building custom journeys for differnt clients. If you are curious to find more about the company you can check their website jrni.
